attributes.action: Grange School Parking Latham Avenue Runcorn
attributes.additional_details:
Please sign this petition if you would like:

A crossing (with road markings/traffic lights/crossing person) outside the new school entrance.

Double yellow lines outside the school entrance.

A special pick up/drop off zone for traffic.

Adequate parking facilities.

Changes to the bus route from Latham Avenue to Boston Avenue at school opening/closing times.
